name: bitraf-thelock
description: An electronic lock connected via wireless (Wi-Fi) to MsgFlo / MQTT. It can be used for locking things like tools, doors, etc.

scripts.statemachine-update: ./node_modules/.bin/coffee doc/states.coffee > doc/states.json && ./node_modules/.bin/finito dot doc/states.json > doc/states.dot && dot -T png doc/states.dot -Ksfdp > doc/states.png
